span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 厚颜无耻，放肆大胆： flagrant disregard of courtesy or propriety and an arrogant assumption of privilege
【例】 had the effrontery to insult her father 胆敢辱骂她的父亲
【近】 audacity, brashness, brazenness, insolence, nerve, presumption, temerity
【反】 decorum, propriety, courtesy, grace 得体；timidity 胆小

【记】 ef不，反意 + front 不要脸，不好的面对，厚颜无耻的
